title: Paraelemental
data:
**Paraelementals** are a group of new elementals in [dNetHack](/wiki/DNetHack "DNetHack") that use the E symbol, but extend past earth, air, fire, and water. Note that the [E](/wiki/Elemental "Elemental") class in dNetHack also includes [stalkers](/wiki/Stalkers "Stalkers"), [dream quasielementals](/wiki/Dream_quasielemental "Dream quasielemental"), and a couple of other monsters. Paraelementals have element-based attacks based on their type, but vary in speed and damage depending on the element.

[ ]

## Contents

- [1 Lightning paraelemental](#Lightning_paraelemental)
- [2 Poison paraelemental](#Poison_paraelemental)
- [3 Ice paraelemental](#Ice_paraelemental)
- [4 Acid paraelemental](#Acid_paraelemental)

## Lightning paraelemental

| E lightning paraelemental *(No tile)*                           |                                                                     |
| --------------------------------------------------------------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| **[Difficulty](/wiki/Monster_difficulty "Monster difficulty")** | 10                                                                  |
| **Attacks**                                                     | Touch 1d10 elemental electricity, passive 0d4 elemental electricity |
|                                                                 |                                                                     |

| E lightning paraelemental *(No tile)*                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               |                                                                     |
| ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| **[Difficulty](/wiki/Monster_difficulty "Monster difficulty")**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     | 10                                                                  |
| **Attacks**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         | Touch 1d10 elemental electricity, passive 0d4 elemental electricity |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     |                                                                     |
| **Base [level](/wiki/Monster_level "Monster level")**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               | 8                                                                   |
| **Base [experience](/wiki/Experience_points "Experience points")**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  | 126                                                                 |
| **[Speed](/wiki/Speed "Speed")**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    | 30                                                                  |
| **Base [AC](/wiki/Armor_class "Armor class")**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      | 2                                                                   |
| **[Base MR](/wiki/Magic_resistance_\(monster\) "Magic resistance (monster)")**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      | 30                                                                  |
| **[Alignment](/wiki/Alignment#Monster_alignment "Alignment")**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      | 0 (neutral)                                                         |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     |                                                                     |
| **[Frequency](/wiki/Monster_frequency "Monster frequency")** (by [normal means](/wiki/Normal_mechanism "Normal mechanism"))                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         | 1 (Very rare)                                                       |
| **[Genocidable](/wiki/Genocide "Genocide")**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        | No                                                                  |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     |                                                                     |
| **[Weight](/wiki/Weight "Weight")**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 | 2500                                                                |
| **[Nutritional value](/wiki/Nutrition "Nutrition")**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                | 0                                                                   |
| **[Size](/wiki/Physical_size "Physical size")**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     | huge                                                                |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     |                                                                     |
| **[Resistances](/wiki/Resistance "Resistance")**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    | poison, petrification, electricity                                  |
| **Resistances [conveyed](/wiki/Corpse "Corpse")**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   | None                                                                |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     |                                                                     |
| A lightning elemental:* has [no eyes](/wiki/Eyeless "Eyeless").
* has no limbs.
* has no head.
* is [mindless](/wiki/Mindless "Mindless").
* [does not have a solid form](/wiki/Unsolid "Unsolid").
* [does not eat](/wiki/Inediate "Inediate"). (\*)
* is neither male nor female.
* is [strong](/wiki/Strong "Strong").
* [never leaves a corpse](/wiki/Corpseless "Corpseless"). |                                                                     |

Lightning paraelementals are likely the most lethal of the elementals to an early-game character. Both the passive and touch attack damage are only halved by shock resistance, not totally negated, and capable of destroying items in your inventory.

Lightning paraelementals can be sung into being by blue half-dragon bards.

## Poison paraelemental

| E poison paraelemental *(No tile)*                              |                                                                                        |
| --------------------------------------------------------------- | -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| **[Difficulty](/wiki/Monster_difficulty "Monster difficulty")** | 10                                                                                     |
| **Attacks**                                                     | Touch 3d6 elemental poison (constitution), passive 0d4 elemental poison (constitution) |
|                                                                 |                                                                                        |

| E poison paraelemental *(No tile)*                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          |                                                                                        |
| --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| **[Difficulty](/wiki/Monster_difficulty "Monster difficulty")**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             | 10                                                                                     |
| **Attacks**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 | Touch 3d6 elemental poison (constitution), passive 0d4 elemental poison (constitution) |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             |                                                                                        |
| **Base [level](/wiki/Monster_level "Monster level")**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       | 8                                                                                      |
| **Base [experience](/wiki/Experience_points "Experience points")**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          | 126                                                                                    |
| **[Speed](/wiki/Speed "Speed")**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            | 18                                                                                     |
| **Base [AC](/wiki/Armor_class "Armor class")**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              | 2                                                                                      |
| **[Base MR](/wiki/Magic_resistance_\(monster\) "Magic resistance (monster)")**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              | 30                                                                                     |
| **[Alignment](/wiki/Alignment#Monster_alignment "Alignment")**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              | 0 (neutral)                                                                            |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             |                                                                                        |
| **[Frequency](/wiki/Monster_frequency "Monster frequency")** (by [normal means](/wiki/Normal_mechanism "Normal mechanism"))                                                                                                                                                                                                 | 1 (Very rare)                                                                          |
| **[Genocidable](/wiki/Genocide "Genocide")**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                | No                                                                                     |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             |                                                                                        |
| **[Weight](/wiki/Weight "Weight")**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         | 2500                                                                                   |
| **[Nutritional value](/wiki/Nutrition "Nutrition")**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        | 0                                                                                      |
| **[Size](/wiki/Physical_size "Physical size")**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             | huge                                                                                   |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             |                                                                                        |
| **[Resistances](/wiki/Resistance "Resistance")**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            | poison, petrification                                                                  |
| **Resistances [conveyed](/wiki/Corpse "Corpse")**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           | None                                                                                   |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             |                                                                                        |
| A poison paraelemental:* has [no eyes](/wiki/Eyeless "Eyeless").
* has no limbs.
* has no head.
* is [mindless](/wiki/Mindless "Mindless").
* [does not eat](/wiki/Inediate "Inediate"). (\*)
* is neither male nor female.
* is [strong](/wiki/Strong "Strong").
* [never leaves a corpse](/wiki/Corpseless "Corpseless"). |                                                                                        |

Poison paraelementals aren't very threatening to a character with poison resistance, but can seriously injure one without. Poison instadeath has been removed, but the "debilitating" poison that replaces it will severely drain your constitution. Both the passive and touch attack damage are only halved by poison resistance, not totally negated.

Poison paraelementals can be sung into being by green half-dragon bards.

## Ice paraelemental

| E ice paraelemental *(No tile)*                                 |                                                      |
| --------------------------------------------------------------- | ---------------------------------------------------- |
| **[Difficulty](/wiki/Monster_difficulty "Monster difficulty")** | 10                                                   |
| **Attacks**                                                     | Touch 6d6 elemental cold, passive 0d3 elemental cold |
|                                                                 |                                                      |

| E ice paraelemental *(No tile)*                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |                                                      |
| ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ | ---------------------------------------------------- |
| **[Difficulty](/wiki/Monster_difficulty "Monster difficulty")**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      | 10                                                   |
| **Attacks**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          | Touch 6d6 elemental cold, passive 0d3 elemental cold |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |                                                      |
| **Base [level](/wiki/Monster_level "Monster level")**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                | 8                                                    |
| **Base [experience](/wiki/Experience_points "Experience points")**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   | 126                                                  |
| **[Speed](/wiki/Speed "Speed")**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     | 6                                                    |
| **Base [AC](/wiki/Armor_class "Armor class")**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       | 2                                                    |
| **[Base MR](/wiki/Magic_resistance_\(monster\) "Magic resistance (monster)")**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       | 30                                                   |
| **[Alignment](/wiki/Alignment#Monster_alignment "Alignment")**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       | 0 (neutral)                                          |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |                                                      |
| **[Frequency](/wiki/Monster_frequency "Monster frequency")** (by [normal means](/wiki/Normal_mechanism "Normal mechanism"))                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          | 1 (Very rare)                                        |
| **[Genocidable](/wiki/Genocide "Genocide")**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         | No                                                   |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |                                                      |
| **[Weight](/wiki/Weight "Weight")**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  | 2500                                                 |
| **[Nutritional value](/wiki/Nutrition "Nutrition")**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 | 0                                                    |
| **[Size](/wiki/Physical_size "Physical size")**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      | huge                                                 |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |                                                      |
| **[Resistances](/wiki/Resistance "Resistance")**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     | poison, petrification, cold                          |
| **Resistances [conveyed](/wiki/Corpse "Corpse")**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    | None                                                 |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |                                                      |
| An ice paraelemental:* can [survive underwater](/wiki/Amphibious "Amphibious").
* has [no eyes](/wiki/Eyeless "Eyeless").
* has no limbs.
* has no head.
* is [mindless](/wiki/Mindless "Mindless").
* [does not eat](/wiki/Inediate "Inediate"). (\*)
* is neither male nor female.
* is [strong](/wiki/Strong "Strong").
* [never leaves a corpse](/wiki/Corpseless "Corpseless"). |                                                      |

Ice paraelementals are slow, but have very damaging attacks. Cold resistance halves the damage taken, but doesn't fully negate it, and it's still capable of destroying inventory items without extrinsic cold resistance. However, cold paraelementals are very slow and normally avoidable if needed.

Ice paraelementals can be sung into being by white half-dragon bards.

* has no limbs.

* [never leaves a corpse](/wiki/Corpseless "Corpseless"). |                                            |

Acid paraelementals can be dangerous without acid resistance, but aren't quite as damaging as ice paraelementals. They're quite slow as well. However, both their passive attack and their touch attack can corrode your weapon and armor if it's not fixed. Just like the other paraelementals, their damage is only halved by acid resistance.

Acid paraelementals can be sung into being by yellow half-dragon bards.
html:
Paraelemental

From NetHackWiki
Jump to navigation Jump to search

Paraelementals are a group of new elementals in dNetHack that use the E symbol, but extend past earth, air, fire, and water. Note that the E class in dNetHack also includes stalkers, dream quasielementals, and a couple of other monsters. Paraelementals have element-based attacks based on their type, but vary in speed and damage depending on the element.

Contents

  • 1 Lightning paraelemental
  • 2 Poison paraelemental
  • 3 Ice paraelemental
  • 4 Acid paraelemental

Lightning paraelemental

E lightning paraelemental (No tile)
Difficulty 10
Attacks Touch 1d10 elemental electricity, passive 0d4 elemental electricity
E lightning paraelemental (No tile)
Difficulty 10
Attacks

Touch 1d10 elemental electricity, passive 0d4 elemental electricity

Base level 8
Base experience 126
Speed 30
Base AC 2
Base MR 30
Alignment 0 (neutral)
Frequency (by normal means) 1 (Very rare)
Genocidable No
Weight 2500
Nutritional value 0
Size huge
Resistances poison, petrification, electricity
Resistances conveyed None

A lightning elemental:

  • has no eyes.
  • has no limbs.
  • has no head.
  • is mindless.
  • does not have a solid form.
  • does not eat. (*)
  • is neither male nor female.
  • is strong.
  • never leaves a corpse.

Lightning paraelementals are likely the most lethal of the elementals to an early-game character. Both the passive and touch attack damage are only halved by shock resistance, not totally negated, and capable of destroying items in your inventory.

Lightning paraelementals can be sung into being by blue half-dragon bards.

Poison paraelemental

E poison paraelemental (No tile)
Difficulty 10
Attacks Touch 3d6 elemental poison (constitution), passive 0d4 elemental poison (constitution)
E poison paraelemental (No tile)
Difficulty 10
Attacks

Touch 3d6 elemental poison (constitution), passive 0d4 elemental poison (constitution)

Base level 8
Base experience 126
Speed 18
Base AC 2
Base MR 30
Alignment 0 (neutral)
Frequency (by normal means) 1 (Very rare)
Genocidable No
Weight 2500
Nutritional value 0
Size huge
Resistances poison, petrification
Resistances conveyed None

A poison paraelemental:

  • has no eyes.
  • has no limbs.
  • has no head.
  • is mindless.
  • does not eat. (*)
  • is neither male nor female.
  • is strong.
  • never leaves a corpse.

Poison paraelementals aren't very threatening to a character with poison resistance, but can seriously injure one without. Poison instadeath has been removed, but the "debilitating" poison that replaces it will severely drain your constitution. Both the passive and touch attack damage are only halved by poison resistance, not totally negated.

Poison paraelementals can be sung into being by green half-dragon bards.

Ice paraelemental

E ice paraelemental (No tile)
Difficulty 10
Attacks Touch 6d6 elemental cold, passive 0d3 elemental cold
E ice paraelemental (No tile)
Difficulty 10
Attacks

Touch 6d6 elemental cold, passive 0d3 elemental cold

Base level 8
Base experience 126
Speed 6
Base AC 2
Base MR 30
Alignment 0 (neutral)
Frequency (by normal means) 1 (Very rare)
Genocidable No
Weight 2500
Nutritional value 0
Size huge
Resistances poison, petrification, cold
Resistances conveyed None

An ice paraelemental:

  • can survive underwater.
  • has no eyes.
  • has no limbs.
  • has no head.
  • is mindless.
  • does not eat. (*)
  • is neither male nor female.
  • is strong.
  • never leaves a corpse.

Ice paraelementals are slow, but have very damaging attacks. Cold resistance halves the damage taken, but doesn't fully negate it, and it's still capable of destroying inventory items without extrinsic cold resistance. However, cold paraelementals are very slow and normally avoidable if needed.

Ice paraelementals can be sung into being by white half-dragon bards.

Acid paraelemental

E acid paraelemental (No tile)
Difficulty 10
Attacks Touch 3d6 elemental acid, passive 0d4 acid
E acid paraelemental (No tile)
Difficulty 10
Attacks

Touch 3d6 elemental acid, passive 0d4 acid

Base level 8
Base experience 126
Speed 6
Base AC 2
Base MR 30
Alignment 0 (neutral)
Frequency (by normal means) 1 (Very rare)
Genocidable No
Weight 2500
Nutritional value 0
Size huge
Resistances poison, petrification, acid
Resistances conveyed None

An acid paraelemental:

  • has no eyes.
  • has no limbs.
  • has no head.
  • is mindless.
  • does not eat. (*)
  • is neither male nor female.
  • is strong.
  • never leaves a corpse.

Acid paraelementals can be dangerous without acid resistance, but aren't quite as damaging as ice paraelementals. They're quite slow as well. However, both their passive attack and their touch attack can corrode your weapon and armor if it's not fixed. Just like the other paraelementals, their damage is only halved by acid resistance.

Acid paraelementals can be sung into being by yellow half-dragon bards.

rawPage:
'''Paraelementals''' are a group of new elementals in [[dNetHack]] that use the {{white|E}} symbol, but extend past earth, air, fire, and water. Note that the {{mcsl|E}} class in dNetHack also includes [[stalkers]], [[dream quasielemental|dream quasielementals]], and a couple of other monsters. Paraelementals have element-based attacks based on their type, but vary in speed and damage depending on the element.

== Lightning paraelemental ==
{{monster
 |name=lightning paraelemental
 |symbol={{blue|E}}
 |difficulty=10
 |level=8
 |experience=126
 |speed=30
 |AC=2
 |MR=30
 |align=0
 |frequency=1
 |genocidable=No
 |attacks=Touch 1d10 elemental electricity, passive 0d4 elemental electricity
 |weight=2500
 |nutr=0
 |size=huge
 |resistances=poison, petrification, electricity
 |resistances conveyed=None
 |attributes={{attributes|A lightning elemental|
 |nocorpse=1|noeyes=1|nolimbs=1|nohead=1|=
 |mindless=1|unsolid=1|strong=1|neuter=1}}
}}

Lightning paraelementals are likely the most lethal of the elementals to an early-game character. Both the passive and touch attack damage are only halved by shock resistance, not totally negated, and capable of destroying items in your inventory.

Lightning paraelementals can be sung into being by blue half-dragon bards.

{{clear}}

Poison paraelementals aren't very threatening to a character with poison resistance, but can seriously injure one without. Poison instadeath has been removed, but the "debilitating" poison that replaces it will severely drain your constitution. Both the passive and touch attack damage are only halved by poison resistance, not totally negated. 

Poison paraelementals can be sung into being by green half-dragon bards.

{{clear}}

Ice paraelementals are slow, but have very damaging attacks. Cold resistance halves the damage taken, but doesn't fully negate it, and it's still capable of destroying inventory items without extrinsic cold resistance. However, cold paraelementals are very slow and normally avoidable if needed.

Ice paraelementals can be sung into being by white half-dragon bards.

Acid paraelementals can be dangerous without acid resistance, but aren't quite as damaging as ice paraelementals. They're quite slow as well. However, both their passive attack and their touch attack can corrode your weapon and armor if it's not fixed. Just like the other paraelementals, their damage is only halved by acid resistance.

Acid paraelementals can be sung into being by yellow half-dragon bards.
